comments:
Hi Pawel 

I checked out today the latest version from head together with the new target. 
I imported the CAs, put the geclipse VO in and started a new Grid project. I create a Gridjob and tried to submit....

but I failed!!!
with the following errors:

It should be corrected in RC0. Some changes for using securoty tokens were implemented there. At leas I cannot reproduce bug now.
